alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 9:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 927 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George`s Lake, or 12 miles east of Keystone Heights, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, half inch hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Bostwick, George`s Lake and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
